text: [chopping]
Hi everybody! Today I'm going to make

Can you pronounce it? "Kkwarigochu" is Shishito.
Green chili peppers. Mild taste, not very spicy.
Lot of wrinkles,
but also really thin skin and easily you can break.

like this remove all the dirty stuff.
Strain them.
Then I'm going to give a nice shower again.
Then we have to steam.

And then we need dried anchovies!
To make it really tasty, I always use dried anchovies.
